channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My mother-in-law, 95, has $400K in stocks. Would it be smarter taxwise to gift it to her kids — or leave it to them in her will?
item.description: “What is the smartest way to go about this? Will she be taxed?”

item.title: How to create a traditional pension — right now
item.description: Annuities are a better deal now than even a few years ago. So why aren’t people buying them?

item.title: This one-and-done heart-disease treatment just got a $1.3 billion endorsement from Eli Lilly
item.description: Verve Therapeutics’ stock was rallying by a record 80% on Eli Lilly’s premium purchase price for the drug-development company.

item.title: Netflix is setting its sights on the theme-park world, after already taking over TV
item.description: Netflix is moving into the theme-park space with the opening of Netflix House in Philadelphia and Dallas later this year.

item.title: Bye-bye bidding wars: Housing market becomes more buyer-friendly as more sellers slash prices
item.description: For-sale listings are piling up in many real-estate markets in the U.S., according to data from Realtor.com.

item.title: Truist says this internet retailer's revenue is tracking above expectations so investors should buy the dip
item.description: Truist Securities pointed to rising revenue and monthly active users as catalysts that could boost Etsy shares 11% higher.

item.title: How to trade the S&P 500's march to record highs using options as volatility remains elevated
item.description: Equity bears are growling, and bulls are sharpening their horns.

item.title: Investor Steve Eisman says we are headed for a global recession if Trump's tariffs spark a trade war
item.description: The former Neuberger Berman senior portfolio manager said it's extremely hard to predict how these high-stakes trade negotiations would unfold.

item.title: The tech-heavy 'QQQ' is near a new record. Here are the stocks that analysts see taking it over the top
item.description: While a small group of stocks have largely boosted the QQQ this year, analysts predict a more varied slate of winners going forward.

item.title: Josh Brown says AI story and US consumer are the only two things that matter to the markets
